Encamina.desc: My responsibilities are mostly to develop new features on a Web Application called DORA PQ from TIBA, it’s intended to manage logistics needs related to finding freight forwarders, logistics operators, and customs agents in Spain, specifically specializing in international transport.

PSLearning.projectDesc: Mobile and Web applications addressed to the citizen service officers of Punto Solidario. This application allows access to a dynamic and fully self-managed learning mode to improve the skills of Punto Solidario staff.

Movilapap.projectDesc: The Móvilapap application is a cutting-edge mobile application designed to cater to the unique needs of banking clients. This app serves as a gateway for customers to seamlessly access a variety of financial products and exclusive benefits tied to their banking relationships.

DORA.projectDesc: The DORA PQ Web Application by TIBA is a specialized system for managing international transportation and logistical needs in Spain.
